cause.description:
I've had this same graphics card since around '98 or something and I think its time for an upgrade. I always knew that I was in need of an updated graphics card, but when iTunes' "Cover Flow" said it was unable to browse albums on my computer I realized that my computer had officially been outdone by a cell phone (the new iPhone has "Cover Flow").
I just checked; ATI Rage IIC's (my graphics card) were built Windows 95 compatible.
If you actually want to donate to me getting a new graphics card, don't donate to the organization I put. I only put that because I needed to put one and the title seemed somewhat appropriate. If you really feel like donating money for me to buy a new graphics card then just give it to me in person.
1. Jordan needs to get a better graphics card.
2. Playing Halo on a computer is a universal right.
3. My lack of good graphics video game playing must end immediately.
cause.mission: To get Jordan a better graphics card
cause.name: Jordan Needs a new Graphics Card
